mapper.insert: insert into gong( GNO, WRITER, CATEGORY, TITLE, APPLYSTART, APPLYEND, STARTDAY, HOST, WAY, HOMEPAGE, G_COMMENT, PIC, APPLYMONEY, AWARD ) values ( gong_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{category}, #{title}, #{applystart}, #{applyend}, #{startday}, #{host}, #{way}, #{homepage}, #{g_comment}, #{pic}, #{applymoney}, #{award} )
mapper.select: select GNO, WRITER, CATEGORY, CDATE, TITLE, APPLYSTART, APPLYEND, STARTDAY, HOST, WAY, HOMEPAGE, G_COMMENT, CNT, PIC, APPLYMONEY, AWARD from gong order by cdate desc
select GNO, WRITER, CATEGORY, CDATE, TITLE, APPLYSTART, APPLYEND, STARTDAY, HOST, WAY, HOMEPAGE, G_COMMENT, CNT, PIC, APPLYMONEY, AWARD from gong where gno = #{gno}
mapper.update: update gong set CATEGORY = #{category}, TITLE = #{title}, APPLYSTART = #{applystart}, APPLYEND = #{applyend}, STARTDAY = #{startday}, HOST = #{host}, WAY = #{way}, HOMEPAGE = #{homepage}, G_COMMENT = #{g_comment}, PIC = #{pic}, APPLYMONEY = #{applymoney}, AWARD = #{award} where gno = #{gno}
